file_content.text: VT-N9 = observation + relay unit // Messages = not available
VT-N9 = requesting voice authorization // Encrypted message = ready for delivery
This is Darth Malgus to designated strike teams. You are within range of a priority target.
Clan Varad, of the Mandalorian mercenary clans, has declared war against the Empire and attacked three of our colonies.
The Mandalorian warriors have proven valued Imperial allies, but Clan Varad's rebellion must be answered in blood; for this, I call upon you.
Signal Lord Malgus to expect my assistance. Resume.
Display everything you have on the Mandalorian clans.
Full report = currently inaccessible // Mandalorian (summary) = warrior society + multiple species + clan-based + mercenary focus
Imperial relations = positive // Mandalorian clans + long-term contract = alliance
We have located Clan Varad's battle cruiser. The attack begins shortly. But there are... complications.
Report to Vaiken Spacedock and we will finalize the assault.
